snippet: The Weinstein Company plans further action after losing arbitration over the right to use the title “The Butler,” the name of a 1916 Warner Brothers short.
abstract: The Weinstein Company plans further action after losing arbitration over the right to use the title “The Butler,” the name of a 1916 Warner Brothers short.

headline.main: It's Weinstein vs. Warner Brothers Over Use of the Title 'The Butler'
headline.print_headline: Ho Hum, Another Fight For Weinstein Company
